TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAspNetManagementUtility

summary.span: Proporciona métodos del asistente que utiliza el complemento de ASP.NET para la Consola de Administración de Microsoft (MMC).

span.span: Provides helper methods that are used by the ASP.NET snap-in for the Microsoft Management Console (MMC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz IAspNetManagementUtility y Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the IAspNetManagementUtility interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void AcquireVersionList (out string versionList, int versionFirst);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AcquireVersionList([out] string& versionList, int32 versionFirst) cil managed
Public Sub AcquireVersionList (ByRef versionList As String, versionFirst As Integer)
public: void AcquireVersionList([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % versionList, int versionFirst);
abstract member AcquireVersionList : * int -> unit

param.name: versionList
param.span: Lista de valores separados por comas que contiene la versión y la ruta de acceso al archivo Aspnet_isapi.dll de cada versión de ASP.NET instalada.

span.span: A comma-separated list containing the version and path to the Aspnet_isapi.dll for each installed ASP.NET version.

param.name: versionFirst
param.span: 0 para que se muestre la versión de ASP.NET delante de la ruta de acceso para cada entrada; de lo contrario, se muestra la ruta de acceso delante de la versión de ASP.NET para cada entrada.

span.span: A 0 to display the ASP.NET version before the path for each entry; otherwise, display the path before the ASP.NET version for each entry.

summary.span: Devuelve una lista de valores separados por comas que contiene la versión y la ruta de acceso al archivo Aspnet_isapi.dll de cada versión de ASP.NET instalada.

span.span: Returns a comma-separated list containing the version and path to the Aspnet_isapi.dll for each installed ASP.NET version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz y la Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void ChangeScriptMap (string keyPath, string dllInstall, int flags);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ChangeScriptMap([in]string keyPath, [in]string dllInstall, int32 flags) cil managed
Public Sub ChangeScriptMap (keyPath As String, dllInstall As String, flags As Integer)
public: void ChangeScriptMap(System::String ^ keyPath, System::String ^ dllInstall, int flags);
abstract member ChangeScriptMap : string * string * int -> unit

param.name: keyPath
param.span: Ruta de acceso virtual en la que se va a registrar el archivo Aspnet_isapi.dll especificado por la ruta de acceso pasada en dllInstall.

span.span: The virtual path to which to register the Aspnet_isapi.dll specified by the path passed in dllInstall.

param.name: dllInstall
param.span: Ruta de acceso al archivo Aspnet_isapi.dll que se va a registrar con keyPath.

span.span: The path to the Aspnet_isapi.dll to register with keyPath.

param.name: flags
param.span: Comportamiento que debe aplicarse cuando se registra Aspnet_isapi.dll.

span.span: The behavior to use when registering Aspnet_isapi.dll.

summary.span: Asigna el archivo Aspnet_isapi.dll especificado a la ruta de acceso virtual especificada de IIS (Internet Information Services).

span.span: Maps the specified Aspnet_isapi.dll to the specified Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz y la Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void DisplayAspNetConfigSettings (string machineName, string site, string virtualDirectory, string siteName, string location, int processID, out string exception);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisplayAspNetConfigSettings([in]string machineName, [in]string site, [in]string virtualDirectory, [in]string siteName, [in]string location, int32 processID, [out] string& exception) cil managed
Public Sub DisplayAspNetConfigSettings (machineName As String, site As String, virtualDirectory As String, siteName As String, location As String, processID As Integer, ByRef exception As String)

public: void DisplayAspNetConfigSettings(System::String ^ machineName, System::String ^ site, System::String ^ virtualDirectory, System::String ^ siteName, System::String ^ location, int processID, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % exception);
abstract member DisplayAspNetConfigSettings : string * string * string * string * string * int * -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: iAspNetManagementUtility.DisplayAspNetConfigSettings (machineName, site, virtualDirectory, siteName, location, processID, exception)

param.name: machineName
param.span: Equipo del que se va a recuperar la configuración.

span.span: The computer to retrieve configuration settings from.

param.name: site
param.span: Sitio web de IIS desde el que se va a recuperar la configuración.

span.span: The IIS website to retrieve configuration settings from.

param.name: virtualDirectory
param.span: Directorio virtual de IIS del que se va a recuperar la configuración.

span.span: The IIS virtual directory to retrieve configuration settings from.

param.name: siteName
param.span: Nombre del sitio de IIS del que se va a recuperar la configuración.

span.span: The name of the IIS site to retrieve configuration settings from.

param.name: location
param.span: Recurso específico al que se aplica la configuración.

span.span: The specific resource to which the configuration applies.

param.name: processID
param.span: Identificador del proceso del sistema que muestra el cuadro de diálogo de la configuración.

span.span: The system process ID of the process displaying the configuration settings dialog box.

param.name: exception
param.span: Excepción o excepciones que se han producido.

span.span: The exception(s) that occurred.

summary.span: Recupera la configuración de ASP.NET de la aplicación web ASP.NET especificada.

span.span: Retrieves the ASP.NET configuration settings for the specified ASP.NET web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz y la Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void IsRemoteConfigured (out int isRemoteConfigured);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void IsRemoteConfigured([out] int32& isRemoteConfigured) cil managed
Public Sub IsRemoteConfigured (ByRef isRemoteConfigured As Integer)
public: void IsRemoteConfigured([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % isRemoteConfigured);
abstract member IsRemoteConfigured : -> unit

param.name: isRemoteConfigured
param.span: Es 1 si está habilitado el acceso remoto al contenedor de configuración de ASP.NET; de lo contrario, el valor es 0.

span.span: A 1 if remote access to the ASP.NET configuration container is enabled; otherwise, 0.

summary.span: Devuelve un valor que indica si está habilitado el acceso remoto al contenedor de configuración de ASP.NET.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether remote access to the ASP.NET configuration container is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz y la Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void PathIsDirectory (string filename, out int result);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PathIsDirectory([in]string filename, [out] int32& result) cil managed
Public Sub PathIsDirectory (filename As String, ByRef result As Integer)
public: void PathIsDirectory(System::String ^ filename, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % result);
abstract member PathIsDirectory : string * -> unit

param.name: filename
param.span: Ruta de acceso al directorio que se va a comprobar.

span.span: The path to the directory to check.

param.name: result
param.span: 1 si es un directorio; de lo contrario, 0.

span.span: 1 if is a directory; otherwise, 0.

summary.span: Devuelve un valor que indica si el elemento especificado es un directorio.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the specified is a directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz y la Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReadFileDates (string filename, out string creationDate, out string modifiedDate, out string lastAccessDate);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReadFileDates([in]string filename, [out] string& creationDate, [out] string& modifiedDate, [out] string& lastAccessDate) cil managed
Public Sub ReadFileDates (filename As String, ByRef creationDate As String, ByRef modifiedDate As String, ByRef lastAccessDate As String)

public: void ReadFileDates(System::String ^ filename, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % creationDate, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % modifiedDate, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % lastAccessDate);
abstract member ReadFileDates : string * * * -> unit

param.name: filename
param.span: Nombre del archivo del que se van a leer las fechas.

span.span: The name of the file from which to read the dates.

param.name: creationDate
param.span: Fecha y hora de creación del archivo.

span.span: The date and time the file was created.

param.name: modifiedDate
param.span: Fecha y hora de la última modificación del archivo.

span.span: The date and time the file was modified.

param.name: lastAccessDate
param.span: Fecha y hora del último acceso al archivo.

span.span: The date and time the file was last accessed.

summary.span: Devuelve las fechas y horas de creación, modificación y último acceso del valor filename especificado.

span.span: Returns the creation, modified, and last access dates and times for the specified filename.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz y la Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly (int doReg, string assemblyName, string binaryDirectory, out IntPtr exception);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly(int32 doReg, [in]string assemblyName, [in]string binaryDirectory, [out] native int& exception) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly (doReg As Integer, assemblyName As String, binaryDirectory As String, ByRef exception As IntPtr)
public: void RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly(int doReg, System::String ^ assemblyName, System::String ^ binaryDirectory, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % exception);
abstract member RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly : int * string * string * -> unit

param.name: doReg
param.span: 1 para registrar el ensamblado ó 0 para anular el registro del ensamblado.

span.span: A value of 1 to register or a value of 0 to unregister the assembly.

param.name: assemblyName
param.span: Nombre del ensamblado que se va a registrar.

span.span: The name of the assembly to register.

param.name: binaryDirectory
param.span: Directorio que contiene el ensamblado.

span.span: The directory containing the assembly.

param.name: exception
param.span: Puntero a cualquier excepción producida durante el registro.

span.span: A pointer to any exception thrown during registration.

summary.span: Registra el complemento de ASP.NET con la Consola de administración de Microsoft (MMC).

span.span: Registers the ASP.NET snap-in with the Microsoft Management Console (MMC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz y la Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
